RelatedSentence: Vaiko may get RS ticket outside T.N. The Bharatiya Janata Party ( BJP ) , seeking to reach out to more allies from ' important States ' where the National Democratic Alliance ( NDA ) did not fare well in the Lok Sabha polls , is toying with the idea of offering MDMK general secretary Vaiko a Rajya Sabha berth .
The MDMK leader met Prime Minister - designate Narendra Modi and BJP chief Rajnath Singh in New Delhi on Monday .
DMDK founder Vijayakant , his wife Premalatha , and Pattali Makkal Katchi MP Anbumani Ramadoss are also camping in Delhi to take part in the NDA meeting on Tuesday .
The central leadership of the BJP wants to have leaders outside the party from all important States to lend their voice in Parliament in support of the new government .

Vaiko is one of those we are looking at .
We were sure that he would win his seat .
But since he has lost , we are looking at other options to see if we could get him here [ Delhi ] , a senior BJP leader told The Hindu on condition of anonymity .
